text: The Twentieth Century Tramp; or, Happy Hooligan and His Airship is a 1902 American silent comedy movie directed by Edwin S. PorterThe Twentieth Century Tramp; or, Happy Hooligan and His AirshipFilms of Edwin S. Porter and stars J. Stuart Blackton. ==Actors== * J. Stuart Blackton as Happy Hooligan ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1902 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies
title: The Twentieth Century Tramp; or, Happy Hooligan and His Airship
